db:abstract.db:para: For changing the state of a group of a particle.

db:section.db:title: goalState : string
db:section.db:para: The name of the group which the affected particles should move to.

Groups can have defined durations and transitions between them, setting goalState will cause it to disregard any path weightings (including 0) and head down the path which will reach the goalState quickest. It will pass through intermediate groups on that path for their respective durations.

db:section.db:title: jump : bool
db:section.db:para: If true, affected particles will jump directly to the target group instead of taking the shortest valid path to get there. They will also not finish their current state, but immediately move to the beginning of the goal state.
